EmailTemplate.name: 202103_APAC_ATR_Pilots_Webinar_Teams.Auto-Responder
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for registering: Pilots Conference
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name}}
Thank you for registering for the Honeywell Aerospace Airlines Conference for Pilots (details below).
{{my.Add to Calendar:default=edit me}}
Pilots Webinar – APAC March 10, 2021 10:00-11:00 a.m. GMT +8
In order to facilitate a more interactive discussion, this webinar will be held through a Microsoft Teams meeting. Please look forward to an invitation to the meeting from me soon.
Thank you, Jeff Kucharski
jeff.a.kucharski@honeywell.com
